data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
After updating to 128.1.0esr, the "New Message" button inexplicably changed from the blue it used to be to some olive green (#60602c).

How can I get the "normal" button back? Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Edit to correct: it's not a colour I had defined for a tag, as I had first said.

PS: reinstalling didn't solve it.

Hi everyone, longtime user here, actully huge fan. I have Thunderbird installed on two win 10 machines, both updated to the newest version, only installed the google-chat mod.

Since two or so weeks, Thunderbird keeps being stuck at every operation I want it to do. I get mails, its stuck, i send mails, its stuck, i open the app up, its stuck.

Does anyone know what I should do?
